author: john_lupia
post: When I first heard about the purported inscription I was highly skeptical and wrote it off as nonsense. However, I happen to know Dr. Mario Capasso and can only tell you that he is a well known and internationally respected papyrologist at the University of Lecce. If he thinks the inscription is legitimate, frankly, I would be hesitant to disagree with any of his conclusions and give the matter more serious consideration than I would have otherwise..
